title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 563.2 - Application of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 563.2 - Application of rules

State Regulations
(a) This Part
shall apply to all properties in the control and jurisdiction of the
college. (b) This Part shall apply
to all students, visitors, contractors, State employees and employees of
college affiliated organizations. (c) This Part shall apply to all vehicles, including but not limited to automobiles, motorcycles, motorbikes and
snowmobiles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
563.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
